title: Grim Fandango - PC - including Mouse Support, V0 Soundtrack, Puz
description:
Grim Fandango (Including mouse support) Windows - 28/3/2014

You're here because you love Grim Fandango, or you want to find out why people love it. I believe this is the best version of the game to download. It's a bundle that works with residualvm. This package contains the data from both discs, but not in a mountable or burnable form. Using residualvm (which works a lot like scummvm) you can launch the game in modern operating systems with much less hassle than installing it from the discs.

Also, in the past month a modder has created a point & click interface for Grim Fandango. I have included this mod in this package. It runs by default. If you don't like it, or it's buggy, you can still use the keyboard controls - or you can easily disable it (instructions at the bottom of this file).

Enjoy the game!

==How to run==

1. Extract everything in this zip file
2. Run Residualvm.exe
3. Click "Add Game"
4. Double click on the "GrimFiles" folder
5. Click "Choose"
6. Click OK
7. Click start

To make it run in fullscreen, press alt+enter (hold down alt, press enter)

==More Info==

From the readme that came with the mouse mod:

--------
Controls
--------
Most of the keyboard controls still work in the original manner;
while the game should be playable 100% using the mouse only, if there are
some puzzles which you prefer to solve using the old interface, you can do so.

* New controls *
Left-click   : Walk and use 
               If you left-click on an object, it is used. If Manny
               is holding an inventory object, it is used on the scene object.
Double-click : Run and use
               Same as single-click, except Manny will run to the object.
Right-click  : Look at / Use inventory object on its own
               Same as left-click, except Manny will look at an object instead
               of using it. If Manny is holding an inventory object, right-click
               will use it on its own (e.g. deck of cards, or fire extinguisher
               in Beaver Dam)
Middle-click : Open Inventory
(or I key)     If Manny is holding an object, he will put it away.
               Left-click within the inventory selects an object, right-click
               will make Manny look at it.
Space key    : Show all hotspots in the scene
Shift + Z    : Toggle developer mode

* Useful old controls *
Alt+Enter    : Toggle fullscreen mode
Arrow keys   : Control Manny the old fashioned way
E,U,P,I      : Examine, Use, Pickup, Inventory
F1           : Menu (use arrow keys to navigate)
Escape       : Skip some cutscenes
.            : Skip dialogue lines

More documents about residualvm and the mouse mod are in the docs folder.

The mouse mod is from here: http://forums.residualvm.org/viewtopic.php?t=623
ResidualVM is software that runs Grim Fandango in its own virtual machine, making it more compatible with Windows 7. more info here: http://residualvm.org/

To play without the point & click mod, delete residualvm.exe and rename residualvm.exe.old to residualvm.exe - or download residualvm and play using these game files.
